--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
= Common Commands =
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  findmnt                    | findmnt will list all mounted filesystems or
                             | search for a filesystem. The findmnt command is
                             | able to search in /etc/fstab, /etc/mtab or
                             | /proc/self/mountinfo. If device or mountpoint is
                             | not given, all filesystems are shown.
                             |
  file                       | returns the type of file
                             |
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
== Finding Files ==
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  which                      | loks for binaries in $PATH
  locate                     | uses a database, built by `updatedb` to find files
                             | in a database
                             |
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Text Processing
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  cut                        | -f <field number> -d <delimiter>
                             |
  grep                       | -A5 (5 lines after) -B5 (5 lines before)
                             | -R (Recursive)
                             |
